data.title: Hot Topic
data.meta_description: Shop for the latest hot cash, pop culture merchandise, gifts & collectibles at Hot Topic! From hot cash totees, figures & more, Hot Topic is your one-stop-shop for must-have music & pop culture-inspired merch.Shop Hot Topic today!
data.text:
Earn Hot Cash

Receive a Hot Cash coupon for $15 off by making a qualifying purchase of $30 or more from 7/10/24 through 9/10/24 (the “Earning Period”) at Hot Topic stores or online at www.HotTopic.com. Customers may only earn up to $450 in Hot Cash coupons per Earning Period. Qualifying purchases do not include prior purchases, taxes, shipping, gift cards, or donations. If you are a Hot Topic Rewards member, your Hot Cash coupon will be automatically loaded into your rewards account. If you are not a Hot Topic Rewards member, your digital Hot Cash coupon will either be sent via email if the qualifying purchase is made online, or you will receive a physical Hot Cash coupon if the qualifying purchase is made in stores. Customers who redeem Hot Cash coupons from 7/10/24 to 7/21/24 are not eligible to earn Hot Cash coupons for the duration of these dates during the Earning Period. Offer not applicable to employees of Hot Topic, BoxLunch, and Her Universe, or any of their family members. Hot Topic reserves the right to end or modify this promotion at any time.

Spend Hot Cash

All Hot Cash coupons earned between 4/24/24 and 7/9/24 must be redeemed for one-time use at a Hot Topic store or online at www.HotTopic.com on a purchase of $30 or more (before tax and excluding shipping) from 7/11/24 (or 7/10/24 for Hot Topic Rewards members – members must be logged in to use code on this day) through 7/21/24 only (the “Redemption Period”). Customers who redeem Hot Cash coupons during the Redemption Period are not eligible to earn Hot Cash coupons for the duration of the Redemption Period (even if it overlaps with an Earning Period). Must surrender the physical Hot Cash coupon at time of redemption in stores. Must use the promo code printed on the physical Hot Cash coupon to redeem for online purchases. Must activate the digital Hot Cash coupon in your Hot Topic Rewards account to redeem for online purchases. Coupons may not be combined with any other promotions, coupons, discounts, or offers. Cannot be redeemed toward vinyl records, DVDs, CDs, select shoes, select styles, prior purchases, donations, gift cards, taxes, or shipping. Other exclusions may apply. Void if copied, reproduced, sold, or transferred, and where prohibited. Coupons have no cash value, are not redeemable for cash, and will not be replaced if lost or stolen. Offer not applicable to employees of Hot Topic, BoxLunch, and Her Universe, or any of their family members. Hot Topic reserves the right to end or modify this promotion at any time.
